SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui

Class GUIFunc

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.UIFunctions
it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.GUIFunc
public final class GUIFunc extends UIFunctions
This class extends UIFunctions class. It acts as a library for GUI methods that work for most setups across UI elements.

    • setupDisplayTimer

      public static int setupDisplayTimer(float displayTimeSeconds, Timer displayTimer)
      Sets up a display timer.

      A display timer is a timer on which to display notifications for a given amount of seconds.

      Parameters:
      displayTimeSeconds - amount of time to display notification
      displayTimer - timer instance on which to display notification
      Returns:
      amount of displaying time
